author: Jennie O'Sullivan
title: Initiative sees women sewing masks for those in DP
description: A group of 15 women living in six direct provision centres in Co Cork, as part of the Sanctuary Masks Initiative, have set about the task of making 6,000 masks for the close to 2,000 people living in direct provision in the county.
content:
Sophie snips, as Olga sews.
The hum of the sewing machine the only sound in the garden where the two work.
Olga Voytenko and her 16-year-old daughter Sophie are among 15 women living in six direct provision centres in Co Cork, who are part of the Sanctuary … [+2588 chars]
